akn:section.akn:heading: Chief Acquisition Officers and senior procurement executives

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Appointment or Designation of Chief Acquisition Officer.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The head of each executive agency described in section 901(b)(1) (other than the Department of Defense) or 901(b)(2)(C) of title 31 with a Chief Financial Officer appointed or designated under section 901(a) of title 31 shall appoint or designate a non-career employee as Chief Acquisition Officer for the agency.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Authority and Functions of Chief Acquisition Officer.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) In this section, the term “overseas contingency operations” means military operations outside the United States and its territories and possessions that are a contingency operation (as that term is defined in section 101(a)(13) of title 10).
